title: LOST SERIES DUE TO "INACTIVITY"?
body: OK SO I WENT TO PLAY MY THIRD SERIES GAME THEN A POPUP OPENED SAYING THAT I LOST MY SERIES DUE TO INACTIVITY? I WAS IN THE CHAMP SELECT SCREEN? I ALREADY SENT A SUPPORT TICKET. TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK BELOW. {{champion:157}}

replies.body: It looks like something might have happened while you were trying to queue up for that third game, since it's showing there was a queue dodge which counts as a loss in ranked. Having that dodge count as a loss marked your second loss in the series which then ended it.
Yeah, I think I got the "Inactivity" bug that has happened before to several people. I have read other discussions about this earlier.
